languages.text: {n}Регина сконфуженно краснеет и прячет глаза.{/n} "Молю о прощении Вашу Светлость. Я не желала оскорбить вас своими манерами".
{n}Regina blushes in embarrassment and hides her eyes.{/n} "I beg Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s forgiveness. I didn't mean to offend you with my manners."
languages.original_text: {n}Регина сконфуженно краснеет и прячет глаза.{/n} "Молю о прощении Вашу Светлость. Я не желала оскорбить вас своими манерами".

{n}Regina blushes in embarrassment and hides her eyes.{/n} "I beg Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s forgiveness. I didn't mean to offend you with my manners."

languages.text: {n}Détournant le regard, Régina rougit de honte.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, je vous supplie de me pardonner. Je ne voulais aucunement vous offenser par mes manières. »
languages.original_text: {n}Regina blushes in embarrassment and hides her eyes.{/n} "I beg Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s forgiveness. I didn't mean to offend you with my manners."

traits.locale_text: {n}Détournant le regard, Régina rougit de honte.{/n} « Votre Seigneurie, je vous supplie de me pardonner. Je ne voulais aucunement vous offenser par mes manières. »

languages.text: {n}蕾吉娜尴尬地涨红了脸，移开了目光。{/n}“我请求您的原谅，我不是故意要冒犯你的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Regina blushes in embarrassment and hides her eyes.{/n} "I beg Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s forgiveness. I didn't mean to offend you with my manners."

traits.locale_text: {n}蕾吉娜尴尬地涨红了脸，移开了目光。{/n}“我请求您的原谅，我不是故意要冒犯你的。”

languages.text: {n}Regina errötet und verbirgt ihre Augen.{/n} "Ich bitte um Verzeihung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich wollte Euch durch meine Manieren nicht beleidigen."
languages.original_text: {n}Regina blushes in embarrassment and hides her eyes.{/n} "I beg Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s forgiveness. I didn't mean to offend you with my manners."

traits.locale_text: {n}Regina errötet und verbirgt ihre Augen.{/n} "Ich bitte um Verzeihung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich wollte Euch durch meine Manieren nicht beleidigen."

languages.text: {n}Regina, avergonzada, se sonroja y se tapa los ojos.{/n} «Le pido perdón, {mf|milord|milady}. No pretendía ofender{mf|lo|la} con mi indiscreción».
languages.original_text: {n}Regina blushes in embarrassment and hides her eyes.{/n} "I beg Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s forgiveness. I didn't mean to offend you with my manners."

traits.locale_text: {n}Regina, avergonzada, se sonroja y se tapa los ojos.{/n} «Le pido perdón, {mf|milord|milady}. No pretendía ofender{mf|lo|la} con mi indiscreción».

languages.text: {n}レジーナは恥ずかしさから顔を赤らめて、目を隠した。{/n}「陛下、お許しください。私の態度で怒らせるつもりはなかったのです」
languages.original_text: {n}Regina blushes in embarrassment and hides her eyes.{/n} "I beg Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s forgiveness. I didn't mean to offend you with my manners."

traits.locale_text: {n}レジーナは恥ずかしさから顔を赤らめて、目を隠した。{/n}「陛下、お許しください。私の態度で怒らせるつもりはなかったのです」

languages.text: {n}Mahcubiyetten Regina'nın yüzü kızarıyor, gözlerini kaçırıyor.{/n} "Affınıza sığınırım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Terbiyesizlik edip sizi gücendirmek istemedim."
languages.original_text: {n}Regina blushes in embarrassment and hides her eyes.{/n} "I beg Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s forgiveness. I didn't mean to offend you with my manners."
